label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_019
content:
## 2024-07-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 125
- Active: 118
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 32
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 29
- Mid Dose: 32
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 32

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 61.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 110.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 168.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 120.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 22.4
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 107.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 32.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 171.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 252.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 183.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 43.1
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 147.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 39.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 229.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 350.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 244.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 55.5
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 13.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 0.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 23.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 39.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 23.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 1.7

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 51.7
- Erythema Percentage: 26.0
- Swelling Percentage: 15.0
- Induration Percentage: 8.5
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 31.5

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 16.3
- Fatigue Percentage: 42.7
- Myalgia Percentage: 29.4
- Headache Percentage: 23.2
- Chills Percentage: 14.0

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 8.4
- WBC (K) SD: 1.8
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 25.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.2
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 54.4
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 5.6
- Platelets (K) Mean: 220
- Platelets (K) SD: 39
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.4
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.5

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1934, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1973, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1920, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1954, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1911, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- Vaccination day 2: 12 subjects received scheduled dose

### Notes
- Week 19: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 125 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
